content: If you do not think you will use the space and would like to delete your space permanently, submit your request using the Delete button. Please, keep in mind that you will not be able to reactivate your space or recover any information associated with it.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when a user requests to permanently delete their space. It informs users that they will not be able to recover any associated information once deletion is confirmed. This text appears as a helper text in the UI.

usage.context:
return (
 <MainContainer>
 <Text fontSize="13px" className="description">
 {t("PortalDeletionDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Text className="helper">{t("PortalDeletionHelper")}</Text>
 <ButtonWrapper>
 <Button
 className="delete-button button"
 label={t("Common:Delete")}
 primary

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation uses a comma (,) after 'زر حذف' (Delete button) which is not typical in formal Arabic writing. A period (.) is more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace ',' with '.' after 'زر حذف'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'space' is consistently translated as 'domeni' which while potentially understandable, isn't the most precise equivalent. 'Space' in this context refers to a user's personal area within the portal, not a domain name. A more accurate translation would be something like 'xüsusi sahəniz' or 'personal sahəniz'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'domeni' with 'xüsusi sahəniz' or 'personal sahəniz' throughout the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence 'Nəzərə alın ki, siz domeninizi yenidən aktivləşdirə və ya onunla əlaqəli hər hansı məlumatı bərpa edə bilməzsiniz.' could be slightly improved for readability. The conjunction 'və ya' (or) feels a bit clunky in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to: 'Nəzərə alın ki, siz domeninizi yenidən aktivləşdirə bilməzsiniz və onunla əlaqəli hər hansı məlumatı bərpa edə bilməzsiniz.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a period (.) after 'перманентно' which is grammatically correct but stylistically slightly less common than not using a period in this context. While not technically incorrect, it's a slight deviation from a more natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the period after 'перманентно' for a more natural flow: 'Ако смятате, че няма да използвате пространството и искате да изтриете пространството си перманентно, изпратете заявката си чрез бутона Изтриване.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Space' is repeated unnecessarily and sounds unnatural in German. While 'Space' can be used, it's more idiomatic to use a more fitting German equivalent or rephrase the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wenn Sie glauben, dass Sie den Bereich nicht nutzen werden, und Ihren Bereich endgültig löschen möchten, übermitteln Sie Ihren Antrag über die Schaltfläche Löschen. Bitte bedenken Sie, dass Sie Ihren Bereich nicht reaktivieren oder die damit verbundenen Informationen wiederherstellen können.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using 'Bereich' instead of repeating 'Space' multiple times improves readability and sounds more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider consistent use of a suitable German term throughout the sentence for a smoother reading experience. This is closely tied to the incorrect_translation issue.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'tilasi' appears multiple times. While grammatically correct, it might be slightly repetitive and consider using a synonym or rephrasing for improved readability. Specifically 'tilaasi' might be a slightly better choice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing some instances of 'tilasi' with 'tilaasi' for a more natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ջնջել կոճակի միջոցով" is a bit clunky. It literally translates to 'through the delete button'. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ջնջել կոճակի սեղմմամբ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'reactivate your space' is rendered as "նորից ակտիվացնել ձեր տարածքը".  'Նորից' (again) isn't strictly necessary and can make the sentence less fluent. It is generally understood from context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ակտիվացնել ձեր տարածքը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation uses a somewhat formal tone. While not strictly incorrect, it might be slightly less approachable for a user interface. A slightly more conversational tone could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: スペースを使用する予定がなく、完全に削除したい場合は、「削除」ボタンを使ってリクエストを送信してください。削除されたスペースは復元できませんので、ご注意ください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Please, keep in mind" is translated as "명심하시기 바랍니다." While grammatically correct, it's a bit formal for this context. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be something like "참고하시기 바랍니다" or "유념하시기 바랍니다".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 스페이스를 재활성화하거나 스페이스와 관련된 정보를 복구할 수 없음을 참고하시기 바랍니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses a slightly informal tone with the repeated use of 'ກະລຸນາ, ຈົ່ງ'. While not strictly incorrect, it could be made more concise and professional for a settings page. Consider removing one of these phrases.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າທ່ານບໍ່ຄິດວ່າທ່ານຈະໃຊ້ພື້ນທີ່ແລະຕ້ອງການລຶບພື້ນທີ່ຂອງທ່ານຢ່າງຖາວອນ, ໃຫ້ສົ່ງຄໍາຮ້ອງຂໍຂອງທ່ານໂດຍໃຊ້ປຸ່ມລຶບ. ກະລຸນາຈື່ໄວ້ວ່າທ່ານບໍ່ສາມາດເປີດໃຊ້ພື້ນທີ່ຂອງທ່ານຄືນໃຫມ່ຫຼືກູ້ຄືນຂໍ້ມູນໃດໆທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບມັນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "think you will use" is somewhat clunky in the Portuguese translation. A more natural phrasing would be "não pretende usar" or "não pretende utilizar".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se não pretende utilizar o espaço e gostaria de eliminar o seu espaço permanentemente...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "eliminar" is a valid translation of 'delete,' in this context, a more common and user-friendly term would be 'apagar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se não pretende utilizar o espaço e gostaria de apagar o seu espaço permanentemente...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "associated with it" is translated as "associada ao mesmo".  While correct, it's slightly formal. A more approachable phrasing could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: associated with it -> associada a ele

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "tenha em atenção" (have in attention) is not the most natural or idiomatic way to say 'Please, keep in mind' in Portuguese. It's a literal translation that sounds a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using something like 'lembre-se' or 'esteja ciente de que'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'seu espaço' (your space) is repetitive. While grammatically correct, it's stylistically better to vary the language.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing the second 'seu espaço' with 'o espaço' or 'este espaço'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'mesmo' at the end of the sentence 'recuperar qualquer informação associada ao mesmo' is grammatically correct but can be simplified for better readability. It refers back to the space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ao mesmo' with 'a ele' or simply rephrase to 'recuperar qualquer informação associada a ele'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'Ștergere' which is a direct translation of 'Delete' and might be less intuitive for users. Consider a more descriptive term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a phrase like 'Cerere de ștergere' or 'Solicitare de ștergere' for better clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ආශ්‍රිත තොරතුරු" (aashrith thorathuru) is a literal translation of 'associated information'. A more natural phrasing in Sinhala would be something like "ඔබේ අවකාශයට සම්බන්ධ තොරතුරු" (obey avakaayata santhabadda thorathuru) or simply "ඔබේ තොරතුරු" (obey thorathuru).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ අවකාශයට සම්බන්ධ තොරතුරු (obey avakaayata santhabadda thorathuru) or  ඔබේ තොරතුරු (obey thorathuru)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation is understandable, the repeated use of "ඔබගේ" (obagey) can be slightly clunky. Avoiding repetition improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace multiple instances of "ඔබගේ" (obagey) with alternatives where appropriate to improve flow. For example, changing "ඔබගේ ඉල්ලීම යොමන්න" to "ඉල්ලීම යොමන්න".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a period (.) after 'Izbriši' (Delete button). The English version does not. While not strictly an error, maintaining consistency in formatting would improve the translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the period after 'Izbriši'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation includes quotes around the word "Избриши" (Delete). It's better to omit these quotes to match the tone of the English content, which doesn't use them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the quotes around "Избриши".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses quotation marks "Izbriši" which might be inconsistent with the overall style guide. Consider using regular parentheses or a different formatting style for button names.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using (Izbriši) or another consistent formatting style.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'keep in mind' is not accurately translated. 'Lütfen unutmayın' (Please don't forget) is a literal translation, but doesn't convey the nuance of 'keep in mind' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'dikkatte bulun' or 'unutmayın ki' to better convey the intent of reminding the user.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'associated with it' is quite literal. A more natural Turkish phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'onunla ilişkili herhangi bir bilgiyi' with 'ona bağlı herhangi bir bilgiyi' or 'ona ait bilgileri'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "use the space" is translated as "sử dụng không gian này". While technically correct, it sounds a little formal. A more natural phrasing might be "dùng không gian này".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu bạn không nghĩ rằng bạn sẽ dùng không gian này và muốn xóa vĩnh viễn không gian của mình...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Delete button" is translated literally as "nút Xóa". A more conversational translation would be "nút Xóa không gian" or simply "nút xóa".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu bạn không nghĩ rằng bạn sẽ dùng không gian này và muốn xóa vĩnh viễn không gian của mình, hãy gửi yêu cầu của bạn bằng cách dùng nút xóa.
